decision_conditions: The rear dormer window in-situ, by reason of its bulk, scale, mass and inappropriate use of rendered material, appears as a dominant and visually intrusive feature detrimental to the character and appearance of the host property and visual amenity of the rear garden environment, contrary to Local Plan Policies 7 and 26 of the Havering Local Plan and the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agents Chris Ellerbeck via email on 16/11/2024.
description: Retrospective loft conversion with rear dormer and front rooflights
